content: Can you add a new API endpoint?

content.text: Sure, I'll create a new endpoint.

content: FYI, in this project we use FastAPI with the router pattern. Each domain has its own router file in src/routers/. Our convention is to prefix all routes with /api/v2.

content.text: Thanks for the context! I'll follow that pattern.

content: Also, the team uses pydantic v2 models in src/models/ for request/response schemas. We always validate inputs.

content.text: Got it, I'll create the pydantic models first.
